detail.description: Deccan Gold Mines Limited was established in the year 2003 by Australian promoters with deep roots in the mining and exploration sector. Since its inception, DGML and its wholly owned subsidiary Deccan Exploration Services Private Limited (DESPL) have actively pursued gold exploration activities through adoption of modern methods and latest technology in all of its exploration prospects. Since the change in management in October, 2021 the Company has taken significant efforts to expand its portfolio in India and overseas [1]
